item.title: New Website
item.description: After a couple of years using ghost I switched to the static page generator hugo. Hugo is easy to write and easy to publish. But more importantly it doesn’t offer the attack surface ghost does and doesn’t require external ressources like ghost does. It further decreases the amount of ressources used on the server.
